title: B2B/DOT: Company Flex - Proof of Concept for New Location Product Acquisition
description:
Description
The objective of this portfolio epic is to create a Proof of Concept to validate the concept to enable the existing M-API integration to create product orders for complex B2B product portfolio (Company Flex - create basic instance & add location products).
  Proof of Concept
Target:
Be able to place an order for adding a new location to an existing Company Flex in CRM-T
Identify gaps within the process to go on to MVP
Scope:
Get product configuration by MAPI PCM
Have a given partial order
Place order to MAPI POM (Rucksack logic)
 
Minimum: No coding, proof by simulating API calls
 
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/Products+with+more+than+1+location+like+Company+Flex
